unnormalised: Chai pe charcha just got a whole lot more data-driven, folks! New follower analytics platforms are popping up faster than Mumbaiâ€™s local trains, specifically tailored for the Indian market.

unnormalised: Forget just generic demographics; these tools are digging deep. Think sentiment analysis based on regional dialects and identification of fake followers who are probably just bots from Noida trying to inflate follower counts for a quick buck (Rs. 50 per 1000, anyone?).

unnormalised: One platform even boasts the ability to map follower locations down to a 500 sq ft radius! Pretty cool, right?
